text: Viktor Udovenko (; 8 February 1947) is a former professional Soviet football goalkeeper and coach. In 2011 he served as one of the Ukrainian Premier League officials.Viktor Udovenko is 64! (Виктору Удовенко – 64!). FC Metalist Kharkiv. 8 February 2011 ==Notes== ==References == ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Dynamo-2 Kyiv players Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Metalist Kharkiv players Category:FC Torpedo Berdyansk players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Metalist Kharkiv managers Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Viktor Udovenko
